lead_paragraph: Sania Mirza advanced to her first WTA Tour final in two years with a grueling three-set victory against Sybille Bammer at the Bank of the West Classic in Stanford, Calif. Mirza outlasted Bammer, 6-2, 5-7, 6-3. She will play the winner of a later match between top-seeded Anna Chakvetadze and third-seeded Daniela Hantuchova.
